name: Age of Empires II HD: The Forgotten
name_original: Age of Empires II HD: The Forgotten
description:
Age of Empires II HD: The Forgotten is a strategy game developed by Hidden Path Entertainment and Ensemble Studios. It came out on 07-11-2013. Microsoft Studios published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Age of Empires II HD: The Forgotten on PC.
